ContactId.markdownDescription:
ARN of the contact resource

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:[-\w+=\/,.@]+:[-\w+=\/,.@]+:[-\w+=\/,.@]*:[0-9]+:([\w+=\/,.@:-]+)*  

Update requires: No interruption

ChannelName.description: The device name. String of 6 to 50 alphabetical, numeric, dash, and underscore characters.
ChannelName.markdownDescription:
The device name. String of 6 to 50 alphabetical, numeric, dash, and underscore characters.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 255  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z 0-9_\-+'&\uD83C-\uDBFF\uDC00-\uDFFF\u2000-\u3300]+  

Update requires: No interruption

ChannelType.description: Device type, which specify notification channel. Currently supported values: “SMS”, “VOICE”, “EMAIL”, “CHATBOT.
ChannelType.markdownDescription:
Device type, which specify notification channel. Currently supported values: “SMS”, “VOICE”, “EMAIL”, “CHATBOT.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

DeferActivation.description: If you want to activate the channel at a later time, you can choose to defer activation. SSM Incident Manager can't engage your contact channel until it has been activated.
DeferActivation.markdownDescription:
If you want to activate the channel at a later time, you can choose to defer activation. SSM Incident Manager can't engage your contact channel until it has been activated.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

ChannelAddress.description: The details that SSM Incident Manager uses when trying to engage the contact channel.
ChannelAddress.markdownDescription:
The details that SSM Incident Manager uses when trying to engage the contact channel.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the engagement to a contact channel.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the engagement to a contact channel.
